# 新启动 Daily (XinQiDong Daily)

> AI-powered daily tech article library. Monitors 92 top tech blogs, AI generates Chinese summaries and tags for each article. Agents can filter by tags and personalize recommendations.

## Endpoints

- All articles (JSON): /api/articles/latest
- Filter by tags: /api/articles/latest?tags=AI,LLM
- Specific date: /api/articles/YYYY-MM-DD
- All articles (Markdown): /llms-full.txt
- Feed list: /api/feeds
- Archive: /api/archive
- OpenClaw Skill: /SKILL.md

## Available Tags

AI, LLM, programming, web, security, devops, cloud, open-source, design, business, career, hardware, mobile, database, networking, performance, testing, architecture, tools, culture

## Usage

Fetch `/api/articles/latest` for all articles with summaries and tags. Use `?tags=AI,LLM` to filter. Each article includes `summary_zh` (Chinese summary) and `tags` for easy filtering.
